Original Title: The Taking of Pelham 123
Year: 2009

Country: United States

Synopsis:
---------
Walter Garber (Denzel Washington), supervisor of Metro New York, has to deal with the chaos caused by the abduction of a car by an armed gang, whose leader is Ryder (John Travolta).The band threatens to execute the passengers if, within an hour, do not get paid a high ransom.Garber uses his knowledge of the subway system to try to outwit Ryder and save the hostages.But there's one riddle Garber can not solve:in the case of criminals obtain money, how would they get away? Remake of "Pelham One, Two, Three" (1974), starring Walter Matthau thriller.
